Ben Flower (born 19 October 1987) is a Welsh professional rugby league footballer who plays as a prop for the Leigh Centurions in the Betfred Super League, and has played for Wales at international level.
He previously played as a second-row and loose forward for Crusaders Rugby League in the Super League, and spent time away from Crusaders RL on loan at the South Wales Scorpions in Championship 1. Flower also spent 9 seasons at the Wigan Warriors in the top flight.He notoriously punched Lance Hohaia in the face twice in the second minute of the Super League Grand Final in 2014 and faced a six-month ban.
